Header: Colombo Fire Dept rescues woman in Athurugiriya
Content: The Colombo Fire Department rescued a woman who fell into a well in Rukmalgama, Athurugiriya. The Fire Department said that the incident was reported on Thursday morning and several teams had been deployed to rescue the child. The girlâ€™s husband had initially attempted to rescue her with a ladder but owing to injuries she had sustained to her head and arm, the Colombo Fire Department had to intervene. The twenty-girl-year-old woman has been admitted to the Homagama hospital.
